pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Series Copula Models // Functions for the analysis of time series using copula models. The package is based on methodology described in the following references. McNeil, A.J. (2021) doi:10.3390/risks9010014, Bladt, M., McNeil, A.J. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.ecosta.2021.07.004, Bladt, M., McNeil, A.J. (2021) arXiv:2107.00960.
